title: I'll be honest, I don't think most of us are going to play in Season 10
body: When I say most of us I mean us here on forums. We may play out of boredom, or addiction, or even nostalgia, but I don't think most of us will honestly play the game. I personally have found myself drawing more each day rather than playing league because it just simply isn't enjoyable anymore. Now I'll admit I'll hop into game when I want to here the Darkin voice lines and just spend time with them (yeah I know turbo cringe stfu) but outside of that meh...what do you guys think? Are y'all chilling out for the most part in season 10?
